dict.string: Improved integration with ONLYOFFICE DocSpace v3.0
Sign in to your ONLYOFFICE DocSpace and access the new features of version 3.0.
Protect the data in the spreadsheet from unauthorized access with a password.
Tabbed interface in editors on iPad
Enjoy a more streamlined editing experience on your iPad with the new tabbed interface.
Filling in the signature field in PDF forms
Apple and Hangul Word file format support
View documents in Apple (Pages, Numbers, Key) and Hangul Word (HWP, HWPX) formats.
